overview.en: Adventure Gold (AGLD) is the governance token of Loot Project community. And all Loot holders can get an airdrop of AGLD tokens.Loot Project is a collection of 8,000 unique bags of adventurer gear(NFT).  Each loot bag contains 8 items for an adventurer.
overview.zh: Adventure Gold（AGLD）是 Loot Project 社区的治理代币，所有 Loot 持有者都能获得 AGLD 代币空投。Loot 是允许任何人铸造代表一组8个冒险家主题装备物品的 NFT 项目。
